code.installcode: $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "gxboxlive ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `gamertag` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `avatar` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `score` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `rating` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `zone` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `lastplayed` text NOT NULL, `updated` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ");
$vbulletin->db->query_write(" ALTER TABLE `" . TABLE_PREFIX . "gxboxlive` CHANGE `reputation` `reputation` TEXT NOT NULL ");

class="gxblhighlight" id="currentPost"> goldsilverbronze_2.png" alt="$vbphrase[gxbl_rank]: $player[rank]" /> $player[rank]$player[ranksuff] alt1alt2" align="$stylevar[left]" nowrap="nowrap">$player[username] $player[gamertag] goldsilver;" /> goldsilver;" /> $player[score]
$player[reputation]
$player[games] $vbphrase[gxbl_message_x_friend]" /> $vbphrase[gxbl_confirm_x_friend]');">$vbphrase[gxbl_add_x_friend]" />

<script type="text/javascript" src="clientscript/overlib/overlib.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function gXBL_setcursor(type) {
	document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].style.cursor = typeof type == 'undefined' ? 'default' : type;
	links = document.getElementsByTagName('a');
	for(i = 0; i < links.length; i++) links.item(i).style.cursor = typeof type == 'undefined' ? 'pointer' : type;
}

function gXBL_show( type, gamertag) {

	if(type == 'gamercard')
	{
		gXBL_setcursor('progress');

		var html = '<iframe onload="gXBL_setcursor();" src="http://gamercard.xbox.com/'+gamertag+'.card" scrolling="no" frameBorder="0" height="135" width="200">'+gamertag+'</iframe>';

		return overlib(html, BORDER, 0, FULLHTML, WIDTH, 204, HEIGHT, 140, VAUTO, HAUTO);
	}

	if(type == 'nxeavatar')
	{
		gXBL_setcursor('progress');

		var html = '<iframe onload="gXBL_setcursor();" src="http://avatar.xboxlive.com/avatar/'+gamertag+'/avatar-body.png" scrolling="no" frameBorder="0" height="300" width="150">'+gamertag+'</iframe>';

		return overlib(html, BORDER, 0, FULLHTML, WIDTH, 150, HEIGHT, 300, VAUTO, HAUTO);
	}

}

function gXBL_hide() {
	return nd();
}
</script>
<style type="text/css">
.gxblhighlight td {
	border:1px solid yellow;
}

div.xblrep .Stats
{
    float:left;
}


div.xblrep .Stats .Stat
{
    float:left;
    text-align:left;
}

div.xblrep .Stats  .Star
{
    float:left;
    width:12px;
    height:12px;
}

div.xblrep .Stats .Empty
{
    background:url("http://gamercard.xbox.com/Content/images/gamerCard_Icons.png") -10px -10px no-repeat;
}

div.xblrep .Stats .Quarter
{
    background:url("http://gamercard.xbox.com/Content/images/gamerCard_Icons.png") -10px -30px no-repeat;
}

div.xblrep .Stats .Half
{
    background:url("http://gamercard.xbox.com/Content/images/gamerCard_Icons.png") -10px -50px no-repeat;
}

div.xblrep .Stats .ThreeQuarter
{
    background:url("http://gamercard.xbox.com/Content/images/gamerCard_Icons.png") -10px -70px no-repeat;
}

div.xblrep .Stats .Full
{
    background:url("http://gamercard.xbox.com/Content/images/gamerCard_Icons.png") -10px -90px no-repeat;
}
</style>

plugin.phpcode: $hook_query_fields .= ", gxboxlive.rank AS gxblrank, gxboxlive.gamertag AS gxblgamertag, gxboxlive.score AS gxblscore"; $hook_query_joins .= "LEFT JOIN " . TABLE_PREFIX . "gxboxlive AS gxboxlive ON (user.userid = gxboxlive.userid)";

phrasetype.name: Scheduled Tasks
phrasetype.phrase: Scans all gamer cards and collects data for gXboxLive Leaderboard

phrasetype.name: gXboxLive Phrases
phrasetype.phrase: Are you sure you wish to add {1} to your Xbox Live friends list?

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Comma separated list of usergroups which are displayed on the leaderboard. Set to 0 to display all but banned groups.
This will attempt to automatically insert the stats into the forumhome. If it does not automatically instert the information, place $gxblstats where you would like it displayed.
Comma separated list of forum ids to display rank on postbit. 0 for all forums.
This replace the users gamertag with the gamercard in their profile.
This displays a tab in their profile with recent game history.
Choose the template hook location in the navbar.
Choose the template hook location in the postbit.
Choose the template hook location in the quick link menu.
Choose what color stars you wish to use. Choose official Xbox.com images or gXBL images.
Enter how many posts a user must have to be able to show up on the list.
This will show a link to xbox.com which will allow users to invite people to their Xbox Live friends list.
This will display user name styling. This must also be enabled in the main forum settings as well.
This will show a link to xbox.com which allow users to send Xbox Live messages.
Choose how many user names per page should be shown.
This will display statistics about the leaderboard. Choose how many to list in top stats.
This will display statistics on the forum home page. Adds approximately 5 queries.
Display players which have no Xbox Live score.
Display players which have no Xbox Live score. Enabling this can introduce some buggy results.
Enter the profile field id which contains the users Xbox Live GamerTag. Example: field15 is 15
How recent in days must a user have been active to be displayed. Set to 0 to show all users.
Comma separated list of usergroups which can access the page. Set to 0 to allow all access.

If you find this mod useful and would like to
make a donation, please click the PayPal link. Thank you :)

setting.optioncode: select:piped 0|gXBL: Images located in image directory 1|Xbox.com: White stars on dark background 2|Xbox.com: Green stars on light background
